epics.title: Your First Epic
epics.description: This is the beginning of your first epic. You can add tickets into this epic and start working on your project!

tickets.title: Your First Ticket
tickets.description: This is the ticket assigned in your very first epic. You can add more tickets or adjust the values of this ticket!

tickets.title: Another Ticket
tickets.description: This is another ticket from another epic
